text_block_list.name: Copano Rickey
text_block_list.text: Huu, Haa! Training complete! What, it's already this late!? I need to get going!

text_block_list.name: Copano Rickey
text_block_list.text: Nothing left behind, see ya later, Trainer! I'll be heading to the 『Summer Festival Executive Committee』 meeting now～!
Summer Camp was halfway over, and Copano Rickey had been extremely busy. To explain why, we have to go back a few days……――

text_block_list.name: Copano Rickey
text_block_list.text: It seems like the head of the Summer Festival Executive Committee is a fan. They wanted Feng Shui advice about the construction they'll be doing!

text_block_list.name: Copano Rickey
text_block_list.text: To be more specific, it sounds like they want me to attend several of the meetings held during the week and give them Feng Shui advice.

text_block_list.name: Copano Rickey
text_block_list.text: They said 『Using Sensei's knowledge, please help the festival become a place of good fortune』 and were really passionate～! It made me really happy!

text_block_list.name: Copano Rickey
text_block_list.text: If it's okay with Trainer, I want to accept this request…… What do you think? Is it okay? It's okay, isn't it? Right? Right, right!?
……I had some misgivings but, if it's just a few days during the week then she should still be able to get some rest too.
Above all, if she's this enthusiastic, then I think I should be the one pushing her forward.

text_block_list.name: Copano Rickey
text_block_list.text: Alright! Thank you, Trainer!
And with that, she started doing both her training and Summer Festival Executive Committee (Feng Shui Advisor) roles.
A few days out of the week, after training was over she would head to the Executive Committee meetings. Her days were a little busy but, they seemed to be proceeding smoothly. However――

text_block_list.name: Copano Rickey
text_block_list.text: Fuaaah……! Good morning, Trainer.

text_block_list.name: Copano Rickey
text_block_list.text: Hmmm, a little! There were some materials I wanted to prepare for the next meeting. Before I noticed, it was getting light out and Tarumae got mad at me.

text_block_list.name: Copano Rickey
text_block_list.text: Not getting enough sleep can draw in bad luck, so normally I'm careful about that but……it seems like I was a little too enthusiastic!

text_block_list.name: Copano Rickey
text_block_list.text: Well-……you see, actually they wanted to hold another meeting today.

text_block_list.name: Copano Rickey
text_block_list.text: Well, you know how I'm the type to keep pressing forward? Before I realized it, I went from 『Feng Shui Advisor』 to 『Executive Committee Head #2』 I guess.

text_block_list.name: Copano Rickey
text_block_list.text: As I got involved in more and more parts of the project…… I suddenly needed to start preparing more things!

text_block_list.name: Copano Rickey
text_block_list.text: Ah, but you don't have to worry! I'll finish the training, I'm an Uma Musume after all, I won't collapse just from something like this!

text_block_list.name: Copano Rickey
text_block_list.text: And you know, even though it's busy I'm having fun! When I think of all the people smiling at the summer festival, I can feel power welling up from within～!

text_block_list.name: Copano Rickey
text_block_list.text: Oh that's right! Yesterday, we decided on a new design for the coats! They incorporated my Feng Shui advice and it looks really good!

text_block_list.name: Copano Rickey
text_block_list.text: On top of that, we changed the portable shrine colors to be more lucky, added some lucky decorations, set up a special stage……anyways, it'll be on another level from a normal festival!
Her eyes were sparkling as she spoke about the Summer Festival. She had prepared a large amount of materials, and it seemed like she had put a lot of passion in to it.
choice_data_list: (I can't tell her 『You need to stop』……!)

text_block_list.text: If I can't stop her, then I just need to properly support her. I spent the days racking my brain to figure out how to make sure this summer ended without issues.

text_block_list.name: Copano Rickey
text_block_list.text: Eh? Breakfast? For me……oh, waaa, it's a lucky menu～! Short-necked clam miso soup, spinach cooked in soy sauce, and such glossy-looking rice……!

text_block_list.name: Copano Rickey
text_block_list.text: Miso soup is the ultimate fortune food, the clam can sharpen intuition, and green-leafed vegetables give it a healthy look! This rice is for economic fortune! Trainer, did you know!?

text_block_list.name: Copano Rickey
text_block_list.text: Haa, haa……! Finished my run! Trainer, what's next up for training?

text_block_list.name: Copano Rickey
text_block_list.text: Eh, again? It feels like we're taking more than usual though……

text_block_list.name: Copano Rickey
text_block_list.text: Is it? ……well, I guess so!

text_block_list.name: Copano Rickey
text_block_list.text: Huuu-…… today's meeting is over! ……But, just a little more. Once I get back I need to wash the decorations for the tents again!

text_block_list.name: Copano Rickey
text_block_list.text: Huh, Trainer!? Why are you driving that car!? Are you perhaps……picking me up!?

text_block_list.name: Copano Rickey
text_block_list.text: ……Really?

text_block_list.name: Copano Rickey
text_block_list.text: …………Oh, I see! In that case, I'll take you up on that offer. ……Ehehe.
And like this, the days where I supported her from the shadows continued…… Until the day of the Summer Festival.
(Hyuuuuuuu～……BOOM!)

text_block_list.name: Copano Rickey
text_block_list.text: …………Yeah, yeah yeah yeah! This liveliness, everyone's smiling faces! Isn't this a huge success!?

text_block_list.name: Copano Rickey
text_block_list.text: We placed lucky items everywhere after all, there don't seem to be any issues physically or spiritually! Fufuu, I'm glad I worked hard～!
The Summer Festival venue had plenty of heart-warming lanterns, colorful tents, and brightly-colored coats, just looking around it seemed like the place was tailor-made to make people excited.

text_block_list.name: Copano Rickey
text_block_list.text: Yeah! Ah, but……that's what I want to say to you.

text_block_list.name: Copano Rickey
text_block_list.text: Ahaha! Oh come on, are you still going to play dumb? You were watching over me to make sure I didn't overexert myself, right!?

text_block_list.name: Copano Rickey
text_block_list.text: Preparing my meals, adjusting the training, driving me to and from…… I noticed. Even though as a trainer you're pretty busy already, thank you.

text_block_list.name: Copano Rickey
text_block_list.text: And also! The thing I'm most thankful for, is for you watching over me from the shadows.

text_block_list.name: Copano Rickey
text_block_list.text: With you watching over me like that, just with that……I felt really relieved!

text_block_list.name: Copano Rickey
text_block_list.text: If I ever reached my limit physically or mentally, I was sure you'd be there to stop me. That even in the worst case, you'd be there to catch me if I fell. That's why……I was fine!

text_block_list.name: Copano Rickey
text_block_list.text: Maybe you haven't realized it. But what I realized lately is, to me you are……my lucky charm.

text_block_list.name: Copano Rickey
text_block_list.text: Just having you around is making me lucky! My life will definitely become more and more wonderful!

text_block_list.name: Copano Rickey
text_block_list.text: That's why……you see. From now on, stay by my side, okay? Please keep supporting me, okay?

text_block_list.name: Copano Rickey
text_block_list.text: ……okay? Ehehe.
